snippet: Lawyers in Britain argued on Tuesday that a Muslim cleric, Abu Hamza al-Masri, wanted in the United States on terrorism charges was physically unfit to be extradited.
abstract: Lawyers for Abu Hamza al-Masri, Muslim cleric wanted in the United States on terrorism charges, say that he is physically unfit to face accusations against him and that it would be 'oppressive' to extradite him from Great Britain, where he has been held since 2006.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers in Britain argued on Tuesday that a Muslim cleric, Abu Hamza al-Masri, wanted in the United States on terrorism charges was physically unfit to be extradited.

headline.main: Lawyers Seek to Block Muslim Cleric’s Extradition to U.S.
